feed.title: Category: Google Voice | Random thoughts | Hari KT

entry.title: I Got Google Voice Invitation, but :(
entry.content: I have registered an account for google voice some weeks before. Today I got an invitation from the google team . I was really excited to see it . With in a few seconds I clicked the link to test it . I got the login screen which asks for my password again though I am logged into gmail . I logged into it . But alas it just shows me a screen . its not in your country and its only for US now , and in the future will be available  . Hm I was thinking, if its not for India now then why do they need to send an invitation . The google has geoip to find from where a user is browsing . So they can ignore me . May be the coder doesn’t utilises those great function . Anyway Thanks to google for the nice invitation .

entry.title: Introducing Google Phone Number
entry.content: Hello my dear friends, Google has introduced a new service . The service is called google voice. This service is available for free now . Don’t know what will be in the future . This service is  available only for those who get invites .  The small video demonstrates how it works . Hoping to enjoy the google voice soon . For more information you can go and read http://www.google.com/googlevoice/about.html
